r.d: Fast protocol buffers client for Riak database and session module.
r.n: Since 1.0 stable Features: Issue 10: Automatic retry implemented and set to 1 retry by default Issue 50: vClock now gets read from object if not present in input, making vclock easier to work with. Issue 54: Conflict resolver can now be set on a bucket or passed along to the get function, which can make conflict resolving a lot easier. Fixes: Issue 55: Implemented missing getter for last modified on object.
